com.bmc.arsys.api

Interface QuerySet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, IQuerySource, Query
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    QuerySetImpl

    public interface QuerySet
extends Query, IQuerySource
    The QuerySet class represents set of queries and each pair of queries are bound by the set operator.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int AR_SET_OPERATOR_INTERSECT
      Constants#AR_SET_OPERATOR_INTERSECT returns results which are common in the queries
      static int AR_SET_OPERATOR_MAX 
      static int AR_SET_OPERATOR_MINUS
      Constants#AR_SET_OPERATOR_MINUS returns all results in one query that are not found in the other query
      static int AR_SET_OPERATOR_UNION
      Constants#AR_SET_OPERATOR_UNION combines the results from the queries and return distinct result.
      static int AR_SET_OPERATOR_UNION_ALL
      Constants#AR_SET_OPERATOR_UNION combines the results from the queries and return duplicates as well.

      • Fields inherited from interface com.bmc.arsys.api.IQuerySource

        AR_MULTI_SCHEMA_JOIN_INNER, AR_MULTI_SCHEMA_JOIN_LEFT, AR_MULTI_SCHEMA_JOIN_NONE, AR_MULTI_SCHEMA_JOIN_RIGHT
